Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate Committee of the Council to hold an oversight hearing on the Police Department's procedures regarding the confiscation of life-sustaining prescription medication used to treat HIV-related illness, asthma or other disabling or life-threatening illnesses, from individuals arrested by the police.
Items.MatterName: Oversight Hearing Police Medication for arrested suspects

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the appropriate Committee of the Council to hold an oversight hearing on the Police Department's procedures regarding the confiscation of life-sustaining prescription medication used to treat HIV-related illness, asthma or other disabling or life-threatening illnesses, from individuals arrested by the police.
